roleset.name: move stealthily
roleset.note: SNEAK-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls run-51.3.2, send-11.1-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sneak.01-v)

example.name: no source
example.text: ...they waited a few months and then sneaked back into it.

example.name: with source
example.text: John sneaked from school to work.

example.name: with cargo
example.text: British customs officers said they'd arrested eight men sneaking 111 rare snakes into Britain -- including one man who strapped a pair of boa constrictors under his armpits.
example.arg: including one man who strapped a pair of boa constrictors under his armpits

roleset.name: steal
roleset.note: SNEAK-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls steal-10.5, send-11.1-1. (from sneak.02-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: John sneaked (snuck?) a dozen hard-boiled eggs out of the dining hall in his underwear.

roleset.name: deceiving, surrepticious
roleset.note: SNEAKY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. (from sneaky.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: What makes this wave of IEDs worse is that the devices are getting more effective . Frankly I 've been shocked at how good the Iraqis are with these things right from the start . I mean , after that shameful performance in GW I , did you expect these bastards to be so sneaky , patient , and smart ? I knew this war was a bad idea , but even I never realized what we 'd be up against .
